description.en: 0chain is a fast, flexible, free dCloud for a dApp on any chain. Underlying technology is a 2D Byzantine DPoS consensus protocol (2D-BPoS) with sub-second finality, a fast high-security storage protocol, a self-forking protocol to create a chain for a specific app or vertical, an inflation protocol to manage zero cost with 1% inflation, and infinite scalability with parallel chains.
